Notes：
  1. Device Name：Redmi 7A
  2. Codename：pine
  3. Thanks to：Xiaomi Firmware Updater
  4. Unlock Your Bootloader：You need to unlock your phone's bootloader if you want to flash a rom into your phone via fastboot method, and your data could be deleted as you choose, please make sure you have backed up your personal data. Apply for Bootloader Unlock here.
